lists.seoContent:
New roof installation

KC Construction Roofing specializes in professional new roof installation for homes and commercial buildings. We guide you through choosing the right materials—architectural asphalt shingles, metal roofing, or low-slope membranes—based on budget, style, and performance goals. Our crews follow manufacturer recommendations and local building codes to ensure proper underlayment, flashing, ventilation, and attic insulation. A correctly installed roof improves energy efficiency, prevents leaks, and protects the structure for decades.

We offer upfront estimates, timeline commitments, and cleanup after the job, so you know what to expect. Interested in a new roof? Call us at [phone] for a free consultation and roof inspection.

lists.seoContent:
Roof replacement

Roof replacement restores protection and appearance when a roof has reached the end of its serviceable life or sustained extensive damage. Our process begins with a thorough inspection to assess decking condition, flashing, and underlayment. We will recommend the best materials for longevity and aesthetics—offering options such as high-performance laminated shingles, impact-resistant products, or metal roofing.

During replacement, we remove old materials, inspect and repair the roof deck, install quality underlayment and ventilation, and finish with new shingles and properly installed flashing. We coordinate with insurance when applicable and provide transparent warranties on workmanship and materials. Schedule a free assessment at [phone].

lists.title: Roof cleaning
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Safe roof cleaning to remove moss, algae, and debris using low-pressure, manufacturer-approved methods.
lists.p2: Our roof cleaning service removes algae, moss, and organic buildup to protect shingles and improve curb appeal while preserving roofing warranties. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Algae removal | Moss prevention | Debris clearing | Improved drainage | Longer shingle life | Better curb appeal
lists.seoContent:
Roof cleaning

Regular roof cleaning prevents moisture retention and biological growth that can shorten shingle life. We use low-pressure soft-wash techniques and eco-friendly cleaning solutions to eliminate algae, lichen, and moss without damaging shingles or voiding warranties. Our technicians protect landscaping and gutters while restoring your roof's appearance and function.

Roof cleaning can also reveal hidden issues like flashing problems or minor damage that should be repaired. For a safe, professional roof cleaning, call KC Construction Roofing at [phone] and schedule a maintenance visit.

lists.seoContent:
Roof repair

Timely roof repair prevents small problems from becoming expensive structural damage. Our team performs thorough leak detection, identifies the source—whether it's flashing, vents, valley issues, or worn shingles—and performs targeted repairs using high-quality materials. We document damage, provide clear estimates, and explain repair options so you can make an informed decision.

For storm-damaged roofs, we offer emergency tarping and work with insurers to speed claim processing. To schedule a prompt roof repair, call us at [phone].

Siding installation

Siding installation by KC Construction Roofing transforms appearance and boosts energy efficiency. We measure and plan installations to ensure proper flashing, moisture barriers, and ventilation to prevent rot and drafts. Our team installs vinyl, fiber cement, and engineered wood siding—matching style, budget, and performance requirements.

Properly installed siding protects the envelope of your home and reduces long-term maintenance. Contact us at [phone] for color and material options and a professional installation estimate.

Siding replacement

Siding replacement restores the protective barrier of your home when materials are aged, damaged, or beyond sensible repair. Our crews remove existing siding, inspect and repair underlying sheathing and framing as needed, and install new siding with proper weather barrier, flashing, and trim work.

We offer guidance on materials that combine longevity with low maintenance and help coordinate color, trim, and soffit choices. For reliable siding replacement and a clear schedule, call [phone].

Siding repair

Siding repair extends the life of your exterior and prevents moisture or pest issues. Our technicians address the root cause—replacing damaged boards, repairing trim, treating rot, and ensuring flashing and seals are correct. We focus on long-term fixes rather than quick patches, matching materials and finishes for a cohesive look.

If you're noticing gaps, soft spots, or visible damage to your siding, call KC Construction Roofing at [phone] for an inspection and honest repair estimate.
